text:
<http://status.aws.amazon.com/|Informational message: EBS Volumes Degraded Performance>
We are investigating degraded performance for EBS volumes in a single Availability Zone in the EU-WEST-2 Region.

<http://status.aws.amazon.com/|Informational message: Connectivity Issues>
We are investigating connectivity issues affecting some database instances in a single Availability Zone in the EU-WEST-2 Region.

<http://status.aws.amazon.com/|Informational message: EBS Volumes Degraded Performance>
We have determined root cause of the degraded performance for EBS volumes in a single Availability Zone in the EU-WEST-2 Region. The degraded performance has been resolved for some of the affected volumes and we continue to work towards full recovery.

<http://status.aws.amazon.com/|Informational message: Connectivity Issues>
We have determined root cause for the connectivity issues affecting some database instances in a single Availability Zone in the EU-WEST-2 Region. The connectivity issues have been resolved for some database instances and we continue to work towards full recovery.

<http://status.aws.amazon.com/|Service is operating normally: [RESOLVED] EBS Volumes Degraded Performance>
Between 9:30 AM and 11:37 AM PDT we experienced degraded performance for some EBS volumes in a single Availability Zone in the EU-WEST-2 Region. The issue has been resolved and the service is operating normally.

<http://status.aws.amazon.com/|Service is operating normally: [RESOLVED] Connectivity Issues>
Between 9:30 AM and 11:40 AM PDT we experienced connectivity issues affecting some database instances in a single Availability Zone in the EU-WEST-2 Region. The issue has been resolved and the service is operating normally.
